website_summaries.verdict: A durable, sharp knife for a great price, but some others just edge it out in terms of overall value.
pros: German steel with a full tang
cons: Some complaints that grip feels awkward

customer_reviews.title: Smartly designed, very sharp and handy knife
customer_reviews.text: Others have mentioned how sharp and easy to handle this knife is. I'll add my voice. I've gotten knives from Costco and other big box stores, and this one blows them out of the water. It stays sharp and cuts through all sorts of hard to cut through items. We used it first for raw chicken and it likely could have cut through the bone had we used more force. Obviously the sharper the knife the more careful you have to be handling it. Finally, make sure to dry off the knife completely. Like razor-blades, keeping knife edges wet is a way to make it lose the edge more quickly. Though if it does, I'd recommend a cheapto supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lotta knife for 28 Bones
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great deal. No idea if the blade will hold up over time. The blade is thinner and slightly bendy compared to my $100 Wustoff, but it's sharp, and the handle is really the best thing - great handle. Can't complain, unless the knife breaks eventually, or if it won't hold a sharp edge. One thing is that the stability of the knife, depending on what you're cutting, isn't as good as other more expensive chefs knives, but you have to look at the price for what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: mfhorn

customer_reviews.title: Good starter knife
customer_reviews.text: Good knife, I am a student and I needed a chef's knife that wouldn't break the bank. This knife comes in a fancy box and was a lot bigger than I had anticipated, but I hadn't had proper kitchen knives before so that makes sense. Overall this has made food prep a lot easier. I agree with some reviewers that the edges on the top of the knife feel sharp. I haven't had any injuries result from it but sometimes I do get nervous putting pressure on the top of the knife with my bare hand.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife. A great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife that fits well in my hand. Seems to be well made and I am looking forward to using it to cut the turkey this year. Update (4/14/2016): I simply love this knife. I bought this and the Cangshan D Series 59168 German Steel Forged Santoku Knife, 7-Inch at the same time. Each is fantastic and has earned a prominent spot in the kitchen. This one is perfect for cutting meats while the santoku is perfect for veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Reittinger

customer_reviews.title: It did not stay sharp after few weeks use
customer_reviews.text: While this knife was sharp out of the box, it did not stay sharp after a few weeks use. I don't mind sharpening it myself but judging by its current price (just under fifty), why not buy the classic Victorinox Fibrox for less money and better reputation. Cangshan is a good value when on sale (twenty some bucks) but not at inflated price.
customer_reviews.author: sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a second one since my parents “acquired” the one I had after making the mistake of bringing it over to their house... I have nothing but good things to say about this knife. Sharp, precise, excellent weight, great price, perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two
customer_reviews.text: Knives are well balanced and super sharp. Other reviews have mentioned that the top of the tang has a real edge to it and that's true. But I took my steel and did a coupe, of passes to round it off and have a very lovely knife as a result. And for the price you can't beat it. Better balanced and sharper than any of my Henckels
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I haven't found a better knife in this price range.
customer_reviews.text: Loving this knife so far. Feels very comfortable in my hand. I work in a professional kitchen and this knife is making prep work a lot easier. I've used a couple other knives in this price range and they don't even come close. Not only does the d series look sleek and fantastic it is also practical in a home or professional setting. Very pleased with this purchase and will be upgrading my home knives with Cangshan.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for a General Use Kitchen Knife
customer_reviews.text: I work In a busy Deli and catering kitchen, and I put this knife through a lot of heavy use. After about a year I can say that this knife is awesome for the price. Still super-sharp as it takes and retains a great edge. I have dropped it many times and it has not chipped or bent. The handle is very comfortable and ergonomic. Like many others, I did have to sand down the spine a bit for a comfortable pinch-grip. My only problem with this knife is the blade is not quite wide enough for my knuckles not to hit the board with a traditional grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent knife at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Knife is very sharp. I feel like it should be heavier than it is though. And the top part of the blade digs into your hands a bit due to the sharp edge when you are holding the knife with a traditional grip.
customer_reviews.author: theRett

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife but gets a little dull
customer_reviews.text: Initially Super sharp but lost sharpness over vegetables. ....In couple days, Generally great quality chefs knives should get you a couple days of limited use..Weight and quality are great
customer_reviews.author: Noah Yates

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful knife, nice weight, balance, and price. I purchased it for my mom as a Christmas gift after looking around at William and Sonoma and reading many reviews on knives on their website and on Amazon. My mother used to be a cooking instructor so she is very particular (but she really took to this knife). While I wish that it came alittle more sharper, you really cannot beat the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I work as a prep/line cook and the only knives we had available for use are the dexter sani-safe and victorinix fibrox. I purchased this knife due to the price point, and the advertised quality. After a couple of months of heavy use, I have had nothing but good things to say about the knife. It holds an edge incredibly well, and hones up rapidly to stay sharp. The full tang gives the knife an amazing balance, with enough weight on the handle to get through thick veggies, but with enough weight on the blade to make for easy rocking and chopping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like Cangshan is doing the job right and at a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this exceptional Chefs Knife. I hit the ground running with this product slicing Pork, assorted Beef Loin, Vegetables and used it to cut Grilled menu items. It cut through them all with speed and precision and after a 10 hour action-packed day in a high capacity kitchen, it held its edge as if it were straight from the box. Looks like Cangshan is doing the job right and at a fraction of the cost- and after careful consideration of this product I am proud to say Cangshan may just have another loyal customer! Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: A cut above the others!!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is fantastic, and the product inside is even better!! A really wonderful gift to someone or a gift to yourself!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife For Price
customer_reviews.text: Had top of the line chefs knife that had the tip broken off. I do catering and had a wedding coming up. Was looking for the same knife but came across this one and starting researching it.... So I ordered it. I used it the day before and of the wedding, still using it weeks later. Amazing knife. Very light weight, fits good in your hand, and I haven't had to sharpen it yet. An absolute great knife would definitely recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really a good knife
customer_reviews.text: Should have spent a little more to get a sharp knife
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grate quality knife.
customer_reviews.text: I pleased with the quality of this knife.Very sharp, with good grind angle.Fast delivery either.Price unbeatable.Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Abramov

customer_reviews.title: This knife cut through the beef like butter. As a chef
customer_reviews.text: Received this knife today, and used it to cut up 15 lbs of beef at work. This knife cut through the beef like butter. As a chef, a good quality knife is vital. And Cangshan knives are good quality. I like this knife better than any of my Wustoff's, and as well as my Henkel, however this knife was a fraction of the cost. Sharp out of the box, German steel, and forged blade. No issues at all. And the packaging makes for an excellent presentation
customer_reviews.author: Leroy A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Best bread slicing knife ever.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite knife for slicing bread -- not so long as many serrated knives, and the slight curve makes it easier to slice. Also good for tomatoes or soft fruits that a regular paring knife can squish.
customer_reviews.author: avid rita

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This beauty is used in 95% of my cutting and I love the way it fits in my hand. It makes me feel like a real chef if you know what I mean. Take good care of it, I once forgot to clean after cutting some fruit and it has a blemish on one side from oxidation (it was left overnight).
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: great price, really great blade edge, a little off balance, have knives that cost more triple the price but are not half as good, solid professional chef's knife at a great value. Thinking of gifting these to my crew this year.
customer_reviews.author: paul rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great knife and sharp , always wash clean and dry right away as soon as finish
customer_reviews.author: William Van Horn

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced knife and very sharp to help make prep faster.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this knife. This is now our go to knife for everything, veggies, meats, chopping slicing you name it, this guy does it. The handle is very comfortable to hold and feels well balanced when we are using it. It stays sharp for a very long time in between honing and re-edging with a stone.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Espana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well but does need to be sharpen now & then.
customer_reviews.author: Alex's mom

customer_reviews.title: amazing and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: amazing and beautiful. so nice that i keep it in its fancy box and don't actually use it much (my other smaller winco knifes get all the action)
customer_reviews.author: Devin B.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp but awkward
customer_reviews.text: This stayed sharp pretty well, and it's fairly priced, I just wasn't a fan of the bolster shape. It was too prone to roughing up the skin and giving me blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife for the price. It arrived quickly and in a nice box. I've had it for over a month and am still quite pleased with it. I never put mine in the dishwasher as I have read that this can cause your knives to become dull much more quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tonyasaurus Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I hadn't heard of the brand name, but boy was I wrong. The knife itself is light, but heavy enough to where you don't need a lot of force to cut. Works perfect for meat, and produce. I am a chef and needed a good knife for work, and this is doing the job. I've currently had it for almost one month and the blade is still super sharp. Handle is ergonomic and it has a perfect grip. Even if you grip it high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A cut above
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive . Good weight, sharp and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonguy T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic knife. I bought as my first kitchen knife and I couldn't be happier, incredibly sharp, great packaging and holds its sharpness for a while. Couldn't be happier with my investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knife!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! This is my new best friend for cutting raw squash in a fraction of the time! Wow!
customer_reviews.author: SpringdaleCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended knife.
customer_reviews.text: This to me looks like a very well made knife and is quite sharp. The quality of this knife is quite obvious. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Random User

customer_reviews.title: A Great Knife!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few Shun knives that are quite expensive, this knife is so great, its almost like a Shun knife at a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amina Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: A New Chef on the block.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a budding chef and he loved it. The size, the weight and the sharpness were all good.
customer_reviews.author: seagull

customer_reviews.title: Great knife with small reservation on disclaimers
customer_reviews.text: Got it LOVE it. Came in a nice box ---- tossed it because I use my knifes and sore in wood block. That said came SHARP. My reservation was how it "felt" when using buying off line I had no idea of that. It handles GREAT well balanced and when I tried it on meat cut down to the block just great. Am a little concerned on the disclaimer on how to care for knife with lots of "do not place in dishwasher", "keep blade dry", not that I do not do that but having it in the disclaimer was concerning looked as a CIA. update the more I use it the better I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Great weight in the hand. I do a lot of chopping and it's now much easier than with my old knife.
customer_reviews.author: jane ringrose

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife, extremely sharp, nice feel and balance. Excellent quality at a great price andd far superior to others at double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Mcginley

customer_reviews.title: what a joy!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a knife I can slice with!!!! what a joy!
customer_reviews.author: Pat OC

customer_reviews.title: very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 5 months ago and still very sharpie, very good quality !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Fancy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my bf and he loves them comes I a nice package
customer_reviews.author: luis estrada

customer_reviews.title: this is a great knife!
customer_reviews.text: perfectly balanced knife ,big but light , it sharpened very well with stone, strong , this is a great knife!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy M. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It holds a nice sharp edge. Comfortable grip. Good value and arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: go2ri2l

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sharp and balanced do nicely. My son loves it. Great gift packaging too
customer_reviews.author: chupacabrathe wookie

customer_reviews.title: Came out of the box like a razor
customer_reviews.text: So far it is freaking awsome. Came out of the box like a razor. I would take this into battle with me...I mean ... use it all the time i the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Newman

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Knife
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with quality and sharpness of this knife. Definitely worthy of the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: SurFisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The knife is very sharp, going to buy another piece.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Knive!!! Very Sharp, good weight, the presentation is very nice, with a nice box, 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife. Haven't had to sharpen it. Stays sharp.
customer_reviews.author: David Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great weight, Great balance, Great shape, and Stays sharp for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sohum Dalal

customer_reviews.title: and any veggies like hot butter
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through meats, and any veggies like hot butter, absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy Kachkovskiy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: Best big knife in my collection and at a very affordable price. Hella sharp - so handle with extreme care!! Strongly recommend A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: good quality. Loved the packing would make a great
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp ...good quality. Loved the packing would make a great gift
customer_reviews.author: LaviD

customer_reviews.title: Decent Knife
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one 4 years ago, still use it for daily cooking. Decent Knife but thick for smooth cut, I manually thinned it to get better performance. It's better if the knife was wider, a little bit narrow when using. The price is $34.95 now, as same as Victorinox 8'' chef knife that use same steel(X50CrMoV15, AKA 1.4116 Stainless steel). also, there is a 8'' chef knife at $12.33 with same steel(X50CrMoV15) on Amazon( Norpro Stainless Steel 8-Inch Chef's Knife).
customer_reviews.author: Yang Zuo

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, better price!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this knife. I sort of wish I would have held out and gotten the three piece set in this D series. I had the opportunity to try a knife in one of their other sets and absolutely loved it. And it was a gift for my sister so I had to let her keep it LOL. This knife cuts through food smoothly. It has significant weight and great balance. I'm very satisfied with the craftsmanship and hope to add more of the D series knives to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: tick

customer_reviews.title: Good knife for the price
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this has a 15 degree edge like an Asian knife vs a 29 degree edge like a European knife. It is sharper and will cut better in certain situations, but it is not as strong and will dull quicker doing certain things and will require more frequent sharpening. I was making lobster and used it to cut the shell to open them up for broiling and it dulled on just 4 lobster shells. I cleaned the edge up with a steel but I used to have no problem doing that with a Wuhstof I had when I worked as a cook..
customer_reviews.author: steve i

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: It's sharp's it cuts is amazing. *** it has been over a month now Nd this is still holding it edge without any breaks in the cutting edge. The quality of the Cangshan chef knife is extremely highly crafted hand sharpen knife with a very comfortable grip style.***
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: My husband just finished a culinary class and I bought him that once he finished. It’s a great quality and design. It is REALLY sharp as well. It comes in a beautiful case that we use as storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size and is sharp. Looks great. I sharpened it with a whetstone and now it's the sharpest knife I have, but it was great out of packing too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McCarn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife for less
customer_reviews.text: Weighted nicely and comfortable in hand for cutting or chopping. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang1

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: This ended up surprising me and easily equals a Global or Wusthof knife at 3-5x its price. The Japanese design with German steel is an odd mix, but it's great in the hand, is well balanced and is well presented in the packaging/box it arrives in.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This bad boy is better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is better than I thought. This knife is "very well constructed" and very SHARP.! Would I recommend, YES, would I buy again YES I would.
customer_reviews.author: T.Barry

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS KNIFE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS KNIFE!!! Other reviews say you will cut your finger, they are correct. Portion of the index finger that applies pressure to the top of the knife while cutting. Little sand paper and the top edge and you will be good to go
customer_reviews.author: Cory D

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for cutting and all around kitchen utility
customer_reviews.text: Great knife for cutting and all around kitchen utility. Ginsu got nuthin on this knife. Cuts my tin cans like a hot knife through butter. Also, when this knife is hot, it cuts through butter really fast and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Zetton

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: A nice, good quality knife. I would prefer it had a bolster.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A knife -- it cuts.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it seems to be a good product. It is very sharp when it arrives. While I won't admit to anything, let's just say that finding body parts got a whole lot more difficult for those searching :).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Snow

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Fit, Finish, and Balance.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I am pleased with the quality, fit, finish, and balance. To be frank, Before buying I was skeptical about the quality of this Chinese-made product. Seem that Cangshan knows how to make kitchen knives. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Williams

customer_reviews.title: Superb Value
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a quality chef's knife before, but this thing has been very impressive. I don't think I'll be able to go back to cheap knives again. With it's effortless cutting and excellent control, this knife really makes the cut. (pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a nice custom fit case, extremely sharp, well balanced yet not too heavy or light. Very satisfied with my purchase, would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond57

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chefs knife for our Florida condo. Five stars for value, four stars overall when compared to my Kramer chefs knife. Knife holds a good edge, blade thickness and handle size about the same as other quality chefs knives.
customer_reviews.author: Brewdog1

customer_reviews.title: Great knife. Sliced through tomatoes and hard cheese like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Sliced through tomatoes and hard cheese like nothing! Best knife in my kitchen. Don't know why I waited so long to buy one of these. I had no idea what I was missing!
customer_reviews.author: KitKat

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This knife is the best. I've gone through 3 knives that were too either too dull or of cheap quality. This knife is super sharp- and cuts anything. I will be purchasing another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: VenaCava

customer_reviews.title: This knife is awesome - has made chopping so much easier and simply ...
customer_reviews.text: This knife is awesome - has made chopping so much easier and simply cutting/slicing anything. I needed to sharpen it after a few months but its back to be perfect! nice handle and feels top notch - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miss S Emile

customer_reviews.title: Buy this with no reservations.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, this is one quality, nice knife. This came in a presentation case, well packaged, made in Japan. German steel, made into a knife in Japan. The knife is quality, solid, riveted handles, razor sharp. It fits well in my hand. This feels equal to and better than German knives I own. I expect this is an heirloom.
customer_reviews.author: DocHolliday

customer_reviews.title: great knife for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife. I got it as a gift for my sister. She loves it! Great weight but not too heavy. Great packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Aus&Jo

customer_reviews.title: ... knife because stay sharp longer is German steel i love it
customer_reviews.text: I give five-star to this knife because stay sharp longer is German steel i love it
customer_reviews.author: Julio Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Knife!
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality knife! Weighted perfectly, cuts extremely well and is built to last. The case it comes with is just the cherry on top!
customer_reviews.author: DamselNDistress

customer_reviews.title: Nice dox case too
customer_reviews.text: Teriffic 8.5 inch chef knife, So well balanced and RAZOR sharp. Nice dox case too.
customer_reviews.author: quick

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice knife. The steel hasn't shown any rust and is keeping an edge. Feels nice in the hand but a little big for me.
customer_reviews.author: MickyT

customer_reviews.title: Great knife at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I work at an Asian fusion restaurant and this knife really does the job for me! I took it to work and my co-workers and chef liked it, two of them ordered them after I let them use it, made from genuine German steel, definetly a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice knife. Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife. Solid construction, well balanced and an easy to grip handle. Seems well made and I enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Hursch

customer_reviews.title: Solid, medium weight chef knife
customer_reviews.text: Solid choice for a chef knife. Very sharp and has held a good edge so far. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I wish it was heavier.
customer_reviews.author: KAinME

customer_reviews.title: ... this as a gift and it came in a beautiful box. I was so pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it came in a beautiful box. I was so pleased! This looks like a very high quality knife, even nicer than JA Henkles!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna B. Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! It is high quality, well balanced, as sharp as sharp gets, and it is a pleasure to use.

customer_reviews.title: but love to cook
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional chef by any means, but love to cook. Really enjoying this knife. Nice weight, beautiful blade.

customer_reviews.title: Solid knife for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great chef's knife. I was expecting a little nicer from the previous reviews, but all things said and done, it's a good knife and looks and feels like high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont be fooled by "made in China"
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all around knife. Great steel. Dont be fooled by "made in China". It outperforms my Japanese $180 blade

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, i dont use it yet but it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great , i dont use it yet but it has very good box with magnetic closure and knife seems very balanced and sharp .for this price i can easily say it is really best deal
customer_reviews.author: mehmet bilal gültekin

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great knife! I am far from a knife experts, but this is the best kbofe I have ever had!

customer_reviews.text: Works very well! very sharp. And the grip fits right in your hand. Easy to use. No complaints. The packing is very ascetically pleasing.

customer_reviews.text: good knife, could be a little sharper out of the box but easily fixable. great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: this is an awesome knife! The best I have used so far
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, this is an awesome knife! The best I have used so far. Razor sharp and easy to handle. I cannot recommend this enough. Very happy with the purchase :)

customer_reviews.title: this is nice. It's sharp
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is nice. It's sharp, but the metal seems a little soft, so I wouldn't use in the dishwasher, and be ready for it to lose it's edge not after too long

customer_reviews.title: Great weight and balance
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Knife for the money. Great weight and balance . Favorite chefs knife I have bought and gifted it to 3 people so far.

customer_reviews.title: Cangshan D Series 8 Inch Knife
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice presentation box, and sharp right out of the box!

customer_reviews.title: great feel thought the blade was a little thin but ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as heck, great feel thought the blade was a little thin but so far is cutting through everything I need to cut perfectly
customer_reviews.author: The Borg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son who is a cook in a Chinese restaurant and a bit of a knife geek/collector. He likes it a lot and says I did a great job picking out a quality knife that is easy to use, sharpens well, etc. He takes it to work to use instead of the knives provided by his employer, and says all the other employees are constantly wanting to borrow it because it cuts better than anything else in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap 8" chef knife
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap 8" chef knife. Don't expect wonders, it is not an Wusthof knife but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian K.

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen knife to work with ..
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to handle, and this knife cuts with precision, happy with me purchase ...
customer_reviews.author: Cyprus sun boy

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: It is sharp. The handle is too short for me; my hand hangs over the end of it sometimes. I also prefer a deeper wedge. If I were a man, I would not buy this knife. It is too small for serious home cooking or fast choppers. The packaging was overkill. I'd spend more on the product and less on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Wheels

product_meta.title: Cangshan TV2 Series 1022728 Swedish Sandvik 14C28N Steel Forged 2-Piece Carving Set
feature_bullets: Full tang forged from high alloy Swedish Sandvik 14C28N Steel with exceptional sharpness, holds an edge up to 5 times longer than German Steel X50Cr15MoV
Patented design knives that focuses on ergonomic handle that easy and comfortable grip
2-piece knife set includes carving knife( 9-inch blade, 5.5-inch handle) and carving fork( overall 11-inch)
Each Knife comes with carbonized solid ashwood half open magnetic sheath
National Sanitation Foundation(NSF) Certified, lifetime warranty against manufacturer defects
